Inputs.Label: Тип звонка
Inputs.Name: CallTypeID
Inputs.SQL: SELECT ict.CallType AS CallTypeID, ict.`Comment` AS CallTypeName FROM ip_calls_type ict LEFT JOIN ip_calls_type child_ict ON child_ict.ParentType = ict.CallType WHERE ict.ParentType != 0 OR child_ict.CallType IS NULL ORDER BY ict.CallType ASC
